cast.overview: Ash, a handsome, shotgun-toting, chainsaw-armed department store clerk, is time warped backwards into England's Dark Ages, where he romances a beauty and faces legions of the undead.
cast.title: Army of Darkness

details.biography: Charles Newton Campbell was born on 10 July 1928 in Detroit, Michigan, USA. He was an advertising executive, college professor and actor, known for Army of Darkness (1992), Stryker's War (1980) and Torro. Torro. Torro! (1981). He was married to Ann Walrad Kelly and Joanne Louise Pickens and was father to Bruce and Donald Campbell. He died on November 3, 2004 in Good Hart, Michigan, USA.
details.name: Charlie Campbell
